definition: to put on a hat/to be first/to dub

sentences.english: Along with being a risk factor for coronary artery disease, obesity may increase your risk of developing an arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖会增加患有冠心病的危险，由此导致心律失常。

sentences.english: Cardiac catheterization with angiography is the reference standard for diagnosing CAD.
sentences.chinese: 心血管导管造影是诊断冠心病的金标准。

sentences.english: Coronary disease is the coronal atherosclerosis heart disease's abbreviation.
sentences.chinese: 冠心病是冠状动脉粥样硬化性心脏病的简称。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the possible association of apolipoprotein M gene polymorphism with coronary artery disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨载脂蛋白M的基因多态性与冠心病的相关性。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the role of plasmatic fibrinogen in the pathogenesis of coronary heart disease (CHD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血浆纤维蛋白原在冠心病发病中的作用。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a first-aid treating device for coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型是一种冠心病急救治疗器。

sentences.english: Gradient gel electrophoresis determine small, dense low-density lipoprotein in plasma of patients with coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 梯度胶电泳法测定冠心病患者血浆小密低密度脂蛋白。

sentences.english: Chief Physician Wang Zhiqiang's experience in treating senile coronary heart disease is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍王治强主任中医师治疗老年性冠心病的经验。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical effect of Nuodikang capsule(NDKC) in treating angina of CHD.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察诺迪康胶囊治疗冠心病心绞痛的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Metal statuses adjusted to well is key for rehabilitation of coronary artery disease.
sentences.chinese: 调整好心理状态是冠心病康复的关键。

sentences.english: Context The coronary artery calcium score (CACS) has been shown to predict future coronary heart disease (CHD) events.
sentences.chinese: 冠状动脉钙评分已经被用来预测未来冠心病事件。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore relationship between the sphygmograms of the radial arteries and coronary heart disease(CHD).
sentences.chinese: 目的，为了探讨寸口脉脉象图和冠心病的关系。

sentences.english: Conclusion CMV infection is related to coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 结论巨细胞病毒感染与冠心病之间关系密切。

sentences.english: Risk factors for coronary heart disease (CHD) are already identifiable in overweight children.
sentences.chinese: 冠心病的危险因素已经出现在超重的儿童中。

sentences.english: It is suggested that fibrinogen in plasma takes an important role in the the pathogenesis of CHD.
sentences.chinese: 血浆纤维蛋白原在冠心病的发病中可能起重要作用。

sentences.english: This side is suitable for coronary disease concurrently weakness of spleen and stomach the patient.
sentences.chinese: 此方适用于冠心病兼脾胃虚弱的患者。

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4
